net.proteusframework.core.hibernate

Annotation Type OnDelete


  • @Target(value={FIELD,METHOD})
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface OnDelete
    Annotation to fill in the gaps of hibernate's foreign key support (version 3.x).

    Be careful in using this, as hibernate will not be aware of changes to the underlying database, you may need to disable 2nd-level cache settings for the associations that use this.

    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      OnRuleAction action
      Get the delete action.
